question: HiI am a 36 yr old male who for the last 6 -8 yrs has been intermittently suffering from a burning sensation at the tip of my penis, aching testicles and occasional kidney/back pain. I have been  to urologists, doctors, been tested for std's and HIV too many times to count and treated for candida and chlamydia 5 times with no success. (Treated for chlamydia without ever having it). Have discovered I'm  allergic to condoms and nylon underwear and still can  not resolve this issue. Some think it could be food related or diabetes. Any one have an idea?
title: Dazed and confused
